website_summaries.verdict: The compact Atari Arcade joystick dock ably converts the iPad into an old-school video game machine that doesn't require batteries, as long as all you're planning to do is play Atari games.
pros: The Atari Arcade, a small, compact docking joystick, detaches easily from the iPad and can fit in a backpack
cons: Buttons and joystick feel stiff and less comfortable than true arcade equivalents like the iCade
The dock forces the iPad into portrait orientation, and it's only compatible with the Atari Greatest Hits app

customer_reviews.title: APPS apparently no longer available-Caution
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough unit but just a paperweight. I bought it as a use for my old ipad, searched high and low for apps but they are apparently no longer available anywhere. If someone knows otherwise please post in answers.
customer_reviews.author: seetwo

customer_reviews.title: It's like being a kid again
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, well constructed. For about $10.00 you get just about every game for the Atari online. The only issue I had was, with the Atari gaming system the control was set with a joystick in the middle and the fire button on the top left. This puts the joystick on the left with the fire buttons on the right which I had to learn. It's similar to the arcade units. I forgot how ugly the games looked back then but they were and still are very playable.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK RECORDS

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift, it was in excellent condition when i received it, and so far it shows connectivity with the ipad I couldn't test it full yet but I will update this review as soon as I get to use it with a game NOTE: you have to buy the games from the game app for 10$ you get 99 games
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iPad Arcade - super fun!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Atari Arcade for iPad - Duo Powered both as a gift to my husband and myself. It is a great product I highly recommend for anyone who loves all the old Atari games as well as new generations of gamers. The arcade is very simple to use. The app pops up as soon as you plug in the iPad. And there are numerous game options. The only reason I didn't give this product 5 stars is because of the extra charge you have to pay for some games. Maybe this doesn't bother some people. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Brings back old memories. You need to purchase the games however it was $9.99 for 100 of them so a very fair price. Purchasing games was a little cumbersome, however. Otherwise it works great and is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Frame

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for the Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for myself ease the use of my Ipad with this to play classic games and it did the job...great device and at a cheap price...because this item I saw it at Walmart for almost 50 bucks...
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: arcade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classic game obsessed husband. He loves it, and acts like a kid in a candy store when he uses this big boy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Merrow

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fit for a 10 yr. old on the plane or car to entertain
customer_reviews.text: It was very exciting from the beginning. He has been playing most days and loves it. He also plays when there is time with his Mom.
customer_reviews.author: flying dangerous

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Crap!!! Do not by this junk!! Does not work and it wants you to purchase other cheap games. Box is a little misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Morales

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son-in-law. He's had quite a bit of fun with it. If you had an Atati as a kid, it seems to be lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. H.

customer_reviews.title: Mini Novelty Item
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift last year. It was a novelty item, brought back some memories of arcade's of the 80's. Used it a couple of times, but not a must have item. If under $25, then it's a good item. I think my wife bought mine when it was $50. Still, I like the concept.
customer_reviews.author: PunxsutawneyPhil

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it promises. I love being able to use the old-school controller to play the old-school games. It was worth it for Adventure and Tempest alone! Highly recommended accessory for your iPad Atari games!
customer_reviews.author: Carl H. Boening

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This has a pretty good joystick with 4 great buttons. Game play is good. It is also a very nice dock that holds your iPad at a nice angle. I don't mind that the games cost extra. I think the software is a bargain. The only real problem is that it only works with the official Atari games. That gives you a dozen decent games and a bunch of really primitive Atari 2600 games.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dunay

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The joystick is clunky--not responsive at all. Very cheaply made item. Bought it to play Tempest. Useless. Glad I paid very little for it.
customer_reviews.author: LP_45

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME RETRO FUN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do you miss awesome arcade fun from the 80s??? This controller will bring back those memories. The joystick and buttons sound and feel just like an old arcade machine. It is really cool playing old Atari game son your ipad. This is a great gift for anyone who kisses the old games.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C Corry

customer_reviews.title: This contraption is a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: No need to buy this "extra" device. Try the app first before buying this device. This contraption is a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Germany

customer_reviews.title: Atari Arcade Duo for IPad
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Makes playing Atari games on the iPad much easier. Excellent for those want a more real feel for the games. You can tell it is made of plastic and is not that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It did not work with either of my ipad. One too old, one too new!
customer_reviews.author: B. Constance

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The joy stick sensitivity is so bad for words; which makes this product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. MacHnik

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother for christmas and was highly disappointed as soon as we opened it up. The atari game pad does not work but with only one app. You cannot use this for anything besides the one app, this was big reason i bought this for her to be able to play any only school game. I would not recommend this product to anyone, for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Musto

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: still getting used to it, but it is fun to use and makes it easier to play atari games with it
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for any Atari enthusiast. Works great. Asteroids!!! and so many more great classics. Love it. Would buy again for a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Olcott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful construction for legacy iPads
customer_reviews.text: This stick only works with Atari games. I purchased this for myself and shortly after gifted it to a friend who is a Millipede addict. I gave up on the beautiful controller with its sturdy design and solid construction because I could not play Pac-Man or any other iCade compatible games (sadface).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holzinger

customer_reviews.title: Retuned it because
customer_reviews.text: It worked for so few games, unless you want to buy the Atari games you love each separately. And where did Defender go???
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Making a grown man feel like a kid again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Atari Arcade as a gift for my husband of over 35 years. As a young man he loved playing Atari and would always talk about "back when" and how much fun those games were verses the games of today. When I saw this piece in a SkyMall magazine while travelling I knew I had to buy him one. When he opened the box I thought he might cry but instead went to work to figure out what he needed to get started to play. It was hilarious... Thank you for making a grown man feel like a kid again. He loves it.....
customer_reviews.author: Ninaville

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cool...
customer_reviews.text: But you have to spend even more money once you get it to buy games. Mildly disappointed about that. Otherwise it seems to be made well and plays like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: missautobahn

customer_reviews.title: Only work with a few games and an additional subscription
customer_reviews.text: I was totally bummed. My bad for not reading reviews. I got this because my Wife likes to play Ms. Pac Man, an Atari classic, and I thought the joystick would work for that. You can't get any of your favorite games to work with this stupid thing. I already threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan anderson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to do
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well at all.Set it up with our ipad and have to spend more money to get the atari app then it doesnt even work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...  Kinda Sluggish.
customer_reviews.text: Whilst the idea of a Bluetooth controller is a fine mission... Many have tried and (As far as I can tell...) none have succeeded.
customer_reviews.author: Confuzed Win User

customer_reviews.title: Decent arcade fun
customer_reviews.text: This item is alright. It is amusing for sure. Take note that it will only work for the specific Atari App and nothing else. For an extra 10 bucks you can get all of the available games. Note that many of the games you will remember from the late 70's and early 80's were not made by Atari so do not expect to play Pac-man or Galaga. For the Atari Arcade there are 99 games and they are either atari 2600 titles or late 70's early 80's arcade games from Atari of which only a few are memorable and with some of those like Missile Command, Centipede and Millipede you are left wishing for a trackball.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gerard

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why this gets such poor reviews. It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this gets such poor reviews. It's awesome! The joystick is just like the arcade. As for not being accurate, it is accurate. People that complain about that must not have ever experienced an actual arcade game from back in the day. As for the games, you do have to buy some through the app. But for $10 you get 100 games. Most of the best ones too. Millipede centipede, yars revenge etc. Cool console. Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice Pro: Easy to use, no batteries required. Plug and play pretty much. Faster response, no lags compare with blue-toothed controller. Small footprint Con: Only works with Atari Greatest Hits, which I didn't know until I got it. Other: Would be nice if any 3rd party will make this work for other games, which is gonna be unlikely. Or Atari make it for their other games, which also unlikely. I own Ion's icade for 2 years now, I think it's too big/heavy and awkward to use. Got this from Woot, if I knew it only supports one game, I would gotten the smaller ion joysticks they have now.
customer_reviews.author: X. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's fine - nice styling, pretty good quality - but I bought it specifically to play Centipede. The controls are probably OK for many of the other Atari games, but they just don't do the job for Centipede. It really needs a smooth trackball, not a joystick.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: Fun, and I made an SDK for it
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of fun as is, but more fun to make your own games for. I couldn't find an SDK so I made one. The hardware was fairly straightforward so I posted an example of how to use it at [...]
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Ghearing

customer_reviews.title: a fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and even my 13 & 15 year old kids have fun with it - retro is in I guess! Super easy to use (take out of box and put your iPad in it!) which is nice and games are fun. If you're looking for a great gift for the iPad user who has all of the other goodies (cases, chargers, etc.) this is a great option!
customer_reviews.author: B. Narciso

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to play this game over the holiday weekend and it was awesome. My 10 and 5 year old boys loved it almost as much as my husband! It was so simple and easy to use, very intuitive and sure does take you back to the original days of Atari. Would absolutely recommend this product for young and old.
customer_reviews.author: KParriott

customer_reviews.title: Retro arcade fun
customer_reviews.text: Cool way to play with buttons and joystick like arcade experience in the 80s. Way better than using touch controls within the app.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Oakwood

customer_reviews.title: app is no longer available in the us app store not very excited about this
customer_reviews.text: it appears the app is no longer available in the us app store
customer_reviews.author: Rob Loisel

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The device works okay. The app is terrible, and heaven help you if you write to their customer service. Save the frustration and do something else. Atari is a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gore

customer_reviews.title: Atari Greatest hits no longer avalible, making controler pointless
customer_reviews.text: I was given this as a gift, it looked good and I was looking forward to playing games, however to my horror when i tried to download the Atari greatest hits the app is no longer available, thus making the whole thing pointless.
customer_reviews.author: P Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Great device if you want to go back to the dark ages of gaming
customer_reviews.text: We chose to download the 99 game ap and found that 97 of the 99 were so primitive that they were unplayable unless you were wearing English Leather cologne and were hoping to ask that fox Brenda to the homecoming dance. Save your money unless you are a forensic game investigator.
customer_reviews.author: oldskul

product_meta.title: Atari Arcade for iPad - Duo Powered
product_meta.description:
Atari Arcade-Duo Powered brings Atari's arcade classics right to your iPad. Relive the fast-action excitement of all your arcade favorites, like Asteroids, Centipede, and Missile Command. Simply connect your iPad to Atari Arcade, download for Duo, and you're ready to share the fun with family and friends anywhere! With its joystick and buttons, Atari Arcade-Duo Powered is exactly the way arcade games were meant to be played! Atari's Greatest Hits app for Atari Arcade is designed for 1-2 players. Works with both iPad & iPad 2.

AMAZON.COM


Download Atari's Greatest Hits to play Asteroids, Missile Command and more. View larger
Works with all generations on iPads and no batteries are required. View larger Go old-school in a new-school way. Relive the fast-action excitement of all your arcade favorites with Atari Arcade, the app-supported joystick controller for iPad. The portable Atari Arcade wireless controller gets friends and family sharing the fun anywhere. The Atari Greatest Hits app for Atari Arcade is designed for 1 or 2 players. With its joystick and buttons, Atari Arcade is exactly the way arcade games were meant to be played.

Relive the fast-action excitement of all your arcade favorites with Atari Arcade ENTER HIGH SCORE HERE
Regaining your top score on dozens of Atari's classic games may just be the best way to celebrate the 40th anniversary of Atari Games. Download Atari's Greatest Hits app from the App Store to play Asteroids, Asteroids Deluxe, Lunar Lander and Missile Command free with Atari Arcade.

EASY TO SET UP
Get ready for "this is the way arcade games are supposed to be played!" game time. It's easy to get started. First, download the Atari Greatest Hits game collection from the App Store. Then connect the Duo Atari controller to your iPad using the iPad 30-pin connector. Choose one of Atari's classic games and select Duo in the control settings. Then it's time to use your Atari Arcade joystic and buttons to show the world who's the real champion.

WORKS WITH EVERY IPAD
The Duo Atari Arcade controller works with all generations of iPads including iPad 1, iPad 2, and iPad 3. No batteries are required--just connect and play.

ABOUT DUO GAMES
Based in Seattle's Pioneer Square district, Duo Games has pioneered a category of portable gaming accessory products to become the worldwide leader in iOS gaming accessories and supporting apps. Duo Games products are designed to exist where digital and physical games meet, mingle, and connect to transform existing hit mobile games into something entirely new, and vastly better.

The Duo line of app-supported accessories for iPad create enhanced, shared gaming experiences with friends and family.
feature_bullets: Relive the fast-action excitement of all your arcade favorites, like Asteroids, Centipede, and Missile Command
Simply connect your iPad to Atari Arcade, download Atari's Greatest Hits app for Duo, and you're ready to share the fun with family and friends anywhere!
Compatible with iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad (3rd generation)
